A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the best movies I've watched in a long time! I give it a 4 1/2 as the only thing I didn't like was Luke Skywalker's parts in the movie. A true Jedi never loses hope\, they stick with the light and are dedicated to fight the dark\, I would of loved to see an actual lightsaber duel with Kylo and Luke. Other than Luke Skywalker's parts I loved it and I recommend people who haven't watched it to watch it! It's fantastic! Ignore the Audience score as the people who did that are anti-Disney\, they probably haven't even watched the movie\, they just hate Disney.
